nodes.text: Mag-pulse grenades were a small cylindrical type of grenade. The Teedo who captured the astromech droid BB-8 on the planet Jakku around thirty years after the Battle of Endor wore a mag-pulse grenade on his bandolier while out scavenging.

A mag-pulse grenade first appeared as a prop in the film Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, which was released in 2015. It was not identified in the film, but received a name in the reference book Star Wars: The Force Awakens: The Visual Dictionary, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and released alongside Episode VII.
